comments:
If assertion are enabled task externalization will fail if the url of a query has been refactored. The refactoring will only affect the repository url but not the query url.

Created an attachment (id=48504)
Fix and test case

I think this bug may apply to other connectors as well.
Patch applied, but fix to setRepositoryUrl moved up to AbstractRepositoryQuery.  As you suspected this affects all connectors, so I also added a test case to TaskListManagerTest.
